S.FORM: u liwan sa tatengaay a cabay. nadikudan nu tuki , u liwan sa tatengaay a cabay. nikaydaan sa , idaw ku cay kapawan , tanguul kiyami. . pakataealen ku duma nayi ku cacanan. . hatiniay tu atademaw , mahida nisepian hatidayu ku paini nu nababalaki .amana kahica hatini kunikaudip, taneng tu kasaetim tu paini nu babalaki ,hidanamin ku balucu' kiya tatengaay abalucu' tademaw tu tademaw , idaw aca ku likeluh balucu' tu balucu', idaw aca ku kasasukapah. . nikasasukaydih nayi ku mihca, widasa u balucu' masasulalid, cacya kubalucu, mabulah, nayay ku laad, nika alac nu bayu' mamuni' ku baetu. . Saka baluduhan sa, yu udadan maladay muculil, pasasuini tu balucu' masasuhelup tu adungu. ; . Yadahay a masasu paini, cay pakasinum tu balicu' isu, tanayu'ay a nihalhal, cay pakahalhal tu dadatengan a tademaw. . Pakadateng tu kaydih, u nikaudipan a wayway; ukaydih cay kaw laway musakam acacay, maydih tu cacay a tatademawan, caykaw kinacacay a makakitin. . hayni ka udipan a makakitin, balucu' tu balucu'; kiya idaw ku balucu' pakadiheku tu balucu' kiya sibalucu' maduduc. . Sukaydih idaw ku cueded' akutii', upaini nu paudipay malaliwasak tu, masasudiheku kiya matenes , u kaydih idaw ku maibuk atu abesa, balucu' idaw ku pacebaay, masasu paini kiya idaw ku diheku. .
